traceability.evidence: Search of bin/dry-aged-deps.js: no handling of `--update` or `--yes` flags found. CLI help text does not list `--update` or `--yes`. No tests in the test suite reference update functionality. README.md does not document `--update` usage (only mentions `--check`).
traceability.notes: The story `011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE` is clearly a specification for adding an auto-update feature, but there is no implementation of the required flags, preview/confirm flow, backup creation, summary reporting, or post-update prompts. No supporting tests exist. All acceptance criteria remain unmet.
